Title: RIA Services Essentials
Description: The RIA Services Essentials project contains sample applications/extensions demonstrating using and extending WCF RIA Services v1.
HomeWiki:
The RIA Services Essentials project contains sample applications/extensions demonstrating using and extending WCF RIA Services v1.

Extensions List

Reusable frameworky components demonstrating RIA Services extensibility features, that you can also incorporate into your own applications.
  • RIAEssentials.Server - General server-side extensions: WebContext, Authentication and authorization for example.
  • RIAEssentials.Server.EntityFramework - Entity Framework and LinqToEntitiesDomainServices related extensions
